transcript:
Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh anya call par vyast hain. Anugrah karke apeksha karun, athava kuch kshan pare aabar chesta karun. Aap jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh anya call par vyast hain. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay pashchat prayas.
Hello.
Hello.
Ji namaskar sir, Siddhant baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Ji bataiye sir kya query hai?
Maa Manasa Fiber Glass se bol raha hu.
Hanji? Haan haan bataiye bataiye.
Han mera ye issue...
Aawaz nahi aa rahi sir aapki.
Hello.
Hello.
Hello.
Hello.
Sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
